faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know before we work together. Still have questions? Let's talk.

items.question: How long does a typical project take?
items.answer: Typical projects take around 2-4 weeks, with delivery timelines shaped by project complexity.

items.question: How much does it cost?
items.answer: Pricing varies by project scope and complexity, and is defined after understanding your goals and requirements.

items.question: What if I need changes or updates after launch?
items.answer: Post-launch updates are supported and handled based on your needs, whether it's refinements, improvements, or new features.

items.question: What makes your approach different?
items.answer: I focus on business outcomes, not just code. Every system is built to free your time and drive growth.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Start with a free 30-minute strategy call. We'll discuss your challenges, goals, and how I can help. No pressure - just clarity on whether we're a good fit. If we move forward, I'll provide a detailed proposal with timeline and investment.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Book a free 30-minute strategy call to discuss your project and see how we can transform your operations.
